title: Begin automating UI acceptance tests
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
Begin automating the UI acceptance tests in the [Loading the Program](https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/wiki/Acceptance-Testing#loading-the-program) section.

- Use FlaUI
- Will need to add automation IDs to controls

iterations.description: The project currently lacks end-to-end UI automation; integrating a library like FlaUI into the existing SpecFlow project (mRemoteNGSpecs) will enable robust regression testing of user scenarios.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): The project currently lacks end-to-end UI automation; integrating a library like FlaUI into the existing SpecFlow project (mRemoteNGSpecs) will enable robust regression testing of user scenarios.
Approach: Integrate FlaUI.UIA3 and FlaUI.Core packages into mRemoteNGSpecs. Create an AppDriver helper to manage the application process lifecycle. Implement SpecFlow hooks for setup/teardown. Add a basic 'SmokeTest.feature' to verify application launch and main window title presence.
